Class ReentrantReadWriteLocks<K extends @Nullable Object>

java.lang.Object
net.dapete.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLocks<K>
Type Parameters:
K - type of key
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReadWriteLocks<K, ReentrantReadWriteLock>
public final class ReentrantReadWriteLocks<K extends @Nullable Object> extends Object

Key-based locking using instances of ReentrantReadWriteLock.

Instances can be created using ReadWriteLocks.reentrant(), ReadWriteLocks.reentrant(Class), ReadWriteLocks.reentrant(boolean) and ReadWriteLocks.reentrant(boolean, Class).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final ReentrantReadWriteLock
    get(K key)
    Returns a lock for the supplied key.
    final ReentrantReadWriteLock
    readLock(K key)
    Return a ReadWriteLock with its ReadWriteLock.readLock() already locked using Lock.lock().
    final int
    size()
    Returns the current number of locks managed by this instance.
    final ReentrantReadWriteLock
    writeLock(K key)
    Return a ReadWriteLock with its ReadWriteLock.writeLock() already locked using Lock.lock().

    • get

      public final ReentrantReadWriteLock get(K key)
      Returns a lock for the supplied key. There will be at most one lock per key at any given time.
      Parameters:
      key - key
      Returns:
      lock

    • size

      public final int size()
      Returns the current number of locks managed by this instance.
      Returns:
      number of locks
